abstract: Commuters in San Francisco area welcome installation of stronger traffic divider on Golden Gate Bridge, which closed span to traffic for 52-hour weekend, longest it has been closed in eight decades; Bay Area residents have called for safer median for years to stop accidents from vehicles crossing into oncoming traffic; new movable barrier is 3,500 steel-clad concrete blocks, huge improvement on flimsy plastic tubes.
lead_paragraph: For the longest period in its nearly eight decades, the Golden Gate Bridge was closed to vehicular traffic during the weekend as crews installed a stronger safety barrier.
snippet: For the longest period in its nearly eight decades, the Golden Gate Bridge was closed to vehicular traffic during the weekend as crews installed a stronger safety barrier.

headline.main: New Golden Gate Bridge Barrier Draws Sighs of Relief
headline.print_headline: New Bridge Barrier Draws Sighs of Relief
